prompt.content: Please translate the user message from Hindi to English. Make the translation sound as natural as possible.

tests.name: hi_en_3
tests.input: हमारे माता-पिता ने हमारी देखभाल की थी और अब हमारी बारी है उनकी देखभाल करने की।
tests.output: Our parents took care of us and now it's our turn to take care of them.
tests.llm_output: Our parents took care of us, and now it's our turn to take care of them.

tests.name: hi_en_11
tests.input: आखिरी बार जब मैंने टॉम को देखा तो वह समुद्र तट की ओर जा रहा था।
tests.output: The last time I saw Tom he was heading towards the beach.
tests.llm_output: The last time I saw Tom, he was heading towards the beach.

tests.name: hi_en_13
tests.input: ब्रिटिशों ने १७६३ में फ़्रांसीसीयों को उत्तर अमेरिका में हराया।
tests.output: The British defeated the French in North America in 1763.
tests.llm_output: The British defeated the French in North America in 1763.

tests.name: hi_en_14
tests.input: मैंने टॉम को बताया उसे क्या करना चाहिए पर उसने वैसा नहीं किया।
tests.output: I told Tom what he should do, but he didn't do it.
tests.llm_output: I told Tom what he should do, but he didn't do it.

tests.name: hi_en_15
tests.input: अल्जीयर्स अल्जेरिया में एक महत्त्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक राजधानी है।
tests.output: Algiers is an important cultural capital in Algeria.
tests.llm_output: Algiers is an important cultural capital in Algeria.

tests.name: hi_en_17
tests.input: तुम्हारे लोग अफग़ानिस्तान में मुसलमानों का क़त्ल कर रहे हैं।
tests.output: Your people are killing Muslims in Afghanistan.
tests.llm_output: Your people are killing Muslims in Afghanistan.

tests.name: hi_en_18
tests.input: क्या तुम मुझे बता सकते हो कि तुम्हारे देश में कितने बजे हैं?
tests.output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?
tests.llm_output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?

tests.name: hi_en_19
tests.input: क्या तुम मुझे बता सकती हो कि तुम्हारे देश में कितने बजे हैं?
tests.output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?
tests.llm_output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?

tests.name: hi_en_23
tests.input: क्या आप मुझे बता सकते हैं कि आपके देश में कितने बजे हैं?
tests.output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?
tests.llm_output: Can you tell me what time it is in your country?

tests.name: hi_en_25
tests.input: टॉम को पता नहीं था करना क्या है तो उसने कुछ नहीं किया।
tests.output: Tom didn't know what to do so he didn't do anything.
tests.llm_output: Tom didn't know what to do, so he didn't do anything.

tests.name: hi_en_29
tests.input: टॉम अपना ज्यादातर समय मैरी की मदद करने में बिताता है।
tests.output: Tom spends most of his time helping Mary.
tests.llm_output: Tom spends most of his time helping Mary.

tests.name: hi_en_38
tests.input: टॉम ने पिछले तीन सालों में तीन किताबें लिखी हैं।
tests.output: Tom has written three books in the last three years.
tests.llm_output: Tom has written three books in the last three years.

tests.name: hi_en_7
tests.input: निम्न वाक्य पहले से ही मौजूद होने के कारण आपका वाक्य जोड़ा नहीं गया।
tests.output: Your sentence was not added because the following already exists.
tests.llm_output: Your sentence was not added because the following sentence already exists.

tests.name: hi_en_45
tests.input: लिंकन की जीवनी दुनिया भर के बच्चे पढ़ते हैं.
tests.output: Lincoln's biography is read by children all around the world.
tests.llm_output: Lincoln's biography is read by children all over the world.

tests.name: hi_en_27
tests.input: दुर्भाग्यवश, मुझे अंग्रेज़ी अच्छी तरह से समझ नहीं आती।
tests.output: Unfortunately, I don't understand English well.
tests.llm_output: Unfortunately, I don't understand English very well.

tests.name: hi_en_42
tests.input: टॉम ही अकेला नहीं था जो पार्टी में नशे में था।
tests.output: Tom wasn't the only one who was one drunk at the party.
tests.llm_output: Tom wasn't the only one who was intoxicated at the party.

tests.name: hi_en_35
tests.input: रीमा ने कहा कि उसका उसके बॉयफ्रेंड से झगड़ा हुआ था।
tests.output: Rima said she had a fight with her boyfriend.
tests.llm_output: Reema said that she had a fight with her boyfriend.

tests.name: hi_en_28
tests.input: एक फ़ुकुओका में रहती है, और बाकी निइगाता में रहते हैं।
tests.output: One lives in Fukuoka, and the others live in Niigata.
tests.llm_output: One lives in Fukuoka, and the rest live in Niigata.

tests.name: hi_en_34
tests.input: अगर कॉफ़ी ज़्यादा कड़वी है तो थोड़ा और पानी डाल लो।
tests.output: If the coffee is too strong, add some more water.
tests.llm_output: If the coffee is too bitter, add some more water.

tests.name: hi_en_16
tests.input: जब वह नहीं कर सकते जो करना चाहते हो, तो वह करो जो कर सकते हो।
tests.output: When you can't do what you want, you do what you can.
tests.llm_output: When you can't do what you want to do, do what you can do.

tests.name: hi_en_32
tests.input: आपकी सिफारिश के लिए धन्यवाद, टॉम को वह नौकरी मिल गई।
tests.output: Thanks to your recommendation, Tom got that job.
tests.llm_output: Thank you for your recommendation, Tom got that job.

tests.name: hi_en_12
tests.input: जिस क्षण मैं टॉम से मिला, मुझे बस इतना पता था कि हम साथ रहेंगे।
tests.output: The moment that I met Tom, I just knew that we'd get along.
tests.llm_output: The moment I met Tom, I just knew that we would be together.

tests.name: hi_en_37
tests.input: क्या आप के पास दस हजार यूरो से ज़्यादा की नकद है?
tests.output: Do you have cash worth more than ten thousand euros?
tests.llm_output: Do you have more than ten thousand euros in cash?

tests.name: hi_en_4
tests.input: मैं हार कैसे सकता हूँ? शैतान ने जवाब दिया। "सभी अंपायर तो यहीं नर्क में हैं।"
tests.output: How can I lose? answered Satan. "All the umpires are down here in Hell."
tests.llm_output: How can I lose? The devil replied, "All the umpires are here in hell."

tests.name: hi_en_31
tests.input: क़ानून ने लोगों को फ़ुटबॉल खेलने से बहुत देर तक रोका।
tests.output: The law kept people from playing football for a while.
tests.llm_output: The law prevented people from playing football for a long time.

tests.name: hi_en_6
tests.input: टॉम कोई संकेत नहीं ले सकता। आपको वास्तव में उसे इसका जादू करना होगा।
tests.output: Tom can't take a hint. You really have to spell it out to him.
tests.llm_output: Tom can't take any hints. You'll really have to spell it out for him.

tests.name: hi_en_1
tests.input: मैंने एक लाल कार और सफ़ेद कार देखी. लाल कार सफ़ेद कार से दिखने में ज़्यादा अच्छी थी.
tests.output: I saw a red car and a white one. The red one was nicer looking than the white one.
tests.llm_output: I saw a red car and a white car. The red car looked better than the white car.

tests.name: hi_en_20
tests.input: आपको एक समय में केवल पांच पुस्तकों को ले जाने की इजाज़त है.
tests.output: You are allowed to check out not more than five books at a time.
tests.llm_output: You are allowed to take only five books at a time.

tests.name: hi_en_43
tests.input: वे बोलते रहे, और लड़के इत्मीनान से सुनते रहे।
tests.output: They kept talking, and the boys comfortably kept listening.
tests.llm_output: They kept talking, and the boy listened with satisfaction.

tests.name: hi_en_44
tests.input: टॉम ने झाँक कर देखा, लेकिन किसी को नहीं देखा।
tests.output: Tom looked through the peephole, but didn't see anyone.
tests.llm_output: Tom peeked but didn't see anyone.

tests.name: hi_en_30
tests.input: कुछ समय के लिए, टॉम उत्प्रवास के बारे में सोच रहा है।
tests.output: For a while now, Tom has been thinking about emigrating.
tests.llm_output: For some time, Tom has been thinking about emigration.

tests.name: hi_en_36
tests.input: टॉम कुछ समय से विदेश जाने के बारे में सोच रहा है।
tests.output: Tom has been thinking about emigrating for a while now.
tests.llm_output: Tom has been thinking about going abroad for some time now.

tests.name: hi_en_9
tests.input: सुबह-शाम को ठंड हो जाती है, इसलिए मैं ढंग से कपड़े पहनना चाहती हूँ।
tests.output: It gets cold in the mornings and evenings, so I want to take care how I dress.
tests.llm_output: It gets cold in the morning and evening, so I want to wear proper clothes.

tests.name: hi_en_46
tests.input: नाव के सफ़र में कार से ज़्यादा समय लगता है.
tests.output: Traveling by boat takes longer than going by car.
tests.llm_output: Traveling by boat takes more time than by car.

tests.name: hi_en_22
tests.input: वह अपने बाल कटवाना चाहती थी, पर उसकी मम्मी राज़ी नहीं थी।
tests.output: She wanted to have her hair cut, but her mother wouldn't let her.
tests.llm_output: She wanted to get her hair cut, but her mom wasn't agreeing.

tests.name: hi_en_2
tests.input: उसने उसे उसका जैकेट हाथ में दे दिया, फिर दरवाज़ा खोला और उसे चले जाने के लिए कहां।
tests.output: She handed him his jacket then opened the door and asked him to leave.
tests.llm_output: He handed her the jacket, then opened the door and told her to go ahead.

tests.name: hi_en_26
tests.input: वह आग जला नहीं सकता था, इसलिए उसने मछली को कच्चा खाया।
tests.output: As he had no way of making fire, he ate the fish raw.
tests.llm_output: He couldn't light the fire, so he ate the fish raw.

tests.name: hi_en_0
tests.input: उन्होंने उन्हें उनका जैकेट हाथ में दे दिया, फिर दरवाज़ा खोला और उन्हें चले जाने के लिए कहां।
tests.output: She handed him his jacket then opened the door and asked him to leave.
tests.llm_output: They handed them their jacket, then opened the door and told them to go ahead and leave.

tests.name: hi_en_5
tests.input: जॉन ने मेरी से पूछा कि वह दोपहर में उसके साथ बाज़ार जाना चाहती है क्या।
tests.output: John asked Mary whether she would like to go shopping in the afternoon.
tests.llm_output: John asked me if I would like to go to the market with him in the afternoon.

tests.name: hi_en_8
tests.input: अगर आपके पास थोड़ा समय हो, तो कृपया निम्न वाक्यों का अनुवाद करेंगे?
tests.output: If you have time, could you translate some sentences below, please?
tests.llm_output: If you have some time, could you please translate the following sentences?

tests.name: hi_en_10
tests.input: क्या आप किसी ऐसे व्यक्ति को जानते हैं जो टॉम की मदद कर सकता है?
tests.output: Do you know anybody who could help Tom?
tests.llm_output: Do you know someone who can help Tom?

tests.name: hi_en_39
tests.input: टॉम एक साल सड़क पर रहा, भोजन के लिए छटपटाता रहा।
tests.output: Tom lived a year on the street, scrounging for food.
tests.llm_output: Tom lived on the street for a year, struggling for food.

tests.name: hi_en_33
tests.input: घर लौटने पर मुझसे शादी करने की उसने प्रतिज्ञा की थी।
tests.output: He pledged to marry me when he returned home.
tests.llm_output: Upon returning home, he had promised to marry me.

tests.name: hi_en_21
tests.input: एक बिटकॉइन के दास करोड़ भाग हैं। एक भाग को सतोशी कहते हैं।
tests.output: Bitcoin is divisible by 100 million. 1 part is called satoshi.
tests.llm_output: There are ten crore parts of a Bitcoin. One part is called a Satoshi.

tests.name: hi_en_47
tests.input: सर्दियों के आने से दिन छोटे होते जाते हैं।
tests.output: With the coming of winter, days are getting shorter.
tests.llm_output: As winter approaches, the days start getting shorter.

tests.name: hi_en_24
tests.input: अगर तुम मदद चाहते हो, तो मैं मदद करने के लिए तैयार हूँ।
tests.output: I'm willing to help you if you want me to.
tests.llm_output: If you need help, I am ready to assist you.

tests.name: hi_en_40
tests.input: तुम हर काम केवल अपनी मर्ज़ी से ही नहीं कर सकते।
tests.output: You shall not have your own way in everything.
tests.llm_output: You cannot do every task only according to your own wishes.

tests.name: hi_en_41
tests.input: हमारी हाँग काँग की ट्रिप को कैनसल कर दोगे क्या?
tests.output: Would you please call off our trip to Hong Kong?
tests.llm_output: Will you cancel our Hong Kong trip?
